description:
Dazai tapes a sign on Kunikida’s back as a prank, but it turns out that Kunikida was about to head to a meeting with some important people.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dazai-san`s Nail Biter / If Only I Could Express My Hundred Thoughts / Please Share! Armed Detective Agency!
Hiyahara Dazai-san / Hyaku no Omoi o Tsugeta nara / Kakusan Kibou! Busou Tanteisha!
ヒヤハラ太宰さん / 百の思いを告げたなら / 拡散希望! 武装探偵社!
